# Copilot Repository Instructions

Whenever I ask in this repository, generate or update documentation in:
- README.md
- docs/architecture.md
- docs/api.md
- docs/usage.md
- docs/contributing.md

Documentation style:
- Clear, concise, easy English
- Include diagrams using Mermaid
- Provide examples when possible
- Keep code samples in C#

Automatically analyze the repository structure before generating docs.
